snippet.title: Knights in Tight Spaces Reveal Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
During the Spring Showcase post-show, the Future Games Show Expansion Pack, we debuted the first trailer for Knights in Tight Spaces, the medieval sequel to Ground Shatter’s 2021 deckbuilding brawler Fights in Tight Spaces.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #knightsintightspaces
